import React from 'react'; import './Home.css'; import pic1 from './pic1.png'; import pic2 from './pic2.png'; import pic3 from './pic3.png'; const Home = () => { return (

🌟 Mission, Vision & Values of Recipe Realm 🌟

The lifestyles we lead and the environments we work in have brought about drastic changes in our health over the past few decades. 🏙️ With urban routines becoming increasingly taxing—polluted surroundings 🌫️, irregular work hours ⏰, and high-stress levels 💼—many of us face physical fatigue and mental burnout 😞.

As the world around us evolves, it's crucial to pause, reflect, and prioritize what fuels us: food and fitness 🍲💪. That's where Recipe Realm steps in!

🚀 Our Mission:

🌈 Our Vision: To build a vibrant, global community where food is more than sustenance—it’s a source of joy, wellness, and connection 🌍❤️. We envision a world where cooking becomes a daily ritual of self-love and well-being. 💡 Our Core Values: Inspiration 🔥 — Encouraging creativity in the kitchen Wellness First 🧘‍♂️ — Promoting a holistic and healthy lifestyle Simplicity 🧂 — Making every recipe doable and fun Sustainability 🌿 — Caring for our planet as much as our plates Community 🤝 — Fostering togetherness, sharing, and growth

How-to-Use

  1. Enter each ingredient in the search bar and press enter if you find it in the auto-suggest list. Check if all the ingredients appear below in the yellow boxes. After ensuring that all the items have been added, click the 'Generate Recipe' button. Your recipe will be generated based on the selected ingredients.
  2. Select any dish.
  3. Use the chatbot for any queries.
); }; export default Home;
